room_title: Escape room "Monica’s Apartment" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Very good escape room that’s well run. Hard enough to definitely make you think but solvable enough to make it possible.

room_title: Escape room "Monica’s Apartment" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Went with our 14 year old, 6 year old and 4 year old today and everyone had a blast! Jackie was our game master and she was wonderful. It’s so nice to find something that entertains the whole family! We escaped Monica’s apartment with just 10 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Monica’s Apartment" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: I went tonight with my boyfriend because I'm a huge friends fan and found out I could escape Monica's apartment. Jackie was super helpful and made our experience even more enjoyable! Wish I lived in the area so I could go back and do another room!
